channel.title: [RELEASE!] Ancient Godsword [UPDATED!]
channel.description:
[size=12pt]My very, very BETA [b]Ancient Godsword[/b]![/size]
[size=12pt]This one was alot harder, so I hope it was worth it.[/size] :D
[size=12pt]Sketch:[/size] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/2u88lys.png[/img]
[size=12pt][b]Ancient Godsword:[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i37.tinypic.com/jaum11.png[/img]
[size=12pt]Well the handle is worst... Can't figure it out something better.[/size] [size=12pt]And "the thing" under handle reminds me Mopar logo. (w/e)[/size] :D
[size=12pt]Also this will be my last [u]Ancient model[/u]... (But I dunno, have a sketch with shield somewhere :D)[/size] ____________________________________________________________________________________________ [size=15pt][b]UPDATED BETTER HANDLE:[/b][/size] [IMG]http://i53.tinypic.com/2r2so0g.png[/img]
[size=15pt][b]RELEASE![/b][/size] [size=12pt]Here is a Metaseq file, so you can also edit:[/size] [size=12pt][URL=http://uppit.com/ykq532jrlt9q/Ancient_GS.rar]Download![/URL][/size]

item.description:
@Eyfia wrote:

[quote=“racaski74, post:19, topic:356647”]beatuiful design i love the brutal sword look of it but since it is ancient couldnt u make like breaks,cracks,wear’n’tear?
it would give it a more wore out sword look also i liek the design of the hilt but it needs like a leather piece like a grip handle on it to make it look more old fashion[/quote]

Dunno just because it’s called Ancient, doesn’t mean it have to be ancient? ;D

item.title: [RELEASE!] Ancient Godsword [UPDATED!]
item.dc:creator: @str_pk3 str pk3
item.description:
@str_pk3 wrote:

u know that handle really cuts ur hand its like ur in rs and u saw this on ground u go and right click “pick” and then u got hit 700 suddenly and then u look at ur hand and say wtf? and jagex send u the option go to dentist for 3months or delete account thats a total lulz so make the handle fixed right so u could release successfully and get about more dleds on uppit or anything else so it looks sooooooooo awesome on 508 and even on 317

Read full topic

item.description:
@druidofgutix wrote:

Man why are u getting bad replies. It looks sooooooooo good. I cant even model at all, although its true there are a few too many spike thing on it. Realisticly it wouldnt be able to slash anything. And plz realese!

item.description:
@badger41 wrote:

tbh, i think it has way too many curves and the handle is very puny…

the symbol on the hilt is in the shape of saradomin, just colored purple, make your own custom symbol

item.title: [RELEASE!] Ancient Godsword [UPDATED!]
item.dc:creator: @kirikugi kirikugi
item.description:
@kirikugi wrote:

[quote=“the wanderer, post:7, topic:356647”][quote author=Godlord006 link=topic=453179.msg3319914#msg3319914 date=1282613075]

Make it an actual handle, right now it looks like a really big blade.

And you made too many curves.

Dumbass, its ancient maybe its supposed to be different from the other godswords by having more blades. Althought he is right make an actual handle.
[/quote]

No sword would have that many curves. He’s not saying it has to be godsword. Just 15 curves is a bit too much. Handle needs some work. Thicker most likely.[/quote]

Haha i see alot of comments basing on the curves of this sword and i only have one thing to say…Why are you all worried about it…its a game why make it more realistic…I think It looks Great Just as!

Read full topic

xldarkwinglx:

item.title: [RELEASE!] Ancient Godsword [UPDATED!]
item.dc:creator: @dylan_0789 dylan_0789
item.description:
@dylan_0789 wrote:

Make the blade and handle match eachother stylistically. At this point, all that would happen is you would put one hand on ut, lift it, and it would break. Make the handle a LOT longer and thicker. Make the blade shorter. Add a real hilt. Spikes are fine and all, but at this point, you would not be able to actually slash, more like a edged crush.

Heres an example:

BGS.jpg800×600

Theres a fair amount of spikes, yet it also has the capability of slashing. Try making this model a little more lifelike and realistic.

Read full topic

Make it an actual handle, right now it looks like a really big blade.

And you made too many curves.
[/quote]

Dumbass, its ancient maybe its supposed to be different from the other godswords by having more blades. Althought he is right make an actual handle.[/quote]
